Author: celestialmisstep
Text: Yuuuup. My dad had a heart attack when I was 19 and ever since then I've been extemely paranoid about it, especially since EDs can damage the heart (and I used to be a heavy amphetamine abuser too which reaaaaally didn't help). At the very least it made me educate myself a lot more on the symptoms and warning signs, and that paranoia stops my ed from getting dangerously bad I think so maybe there's some small benefit to it all.

Author: altoristics
Text: holy shit same - I’ve someone gained a fear of eating ‘fatty’ things because I can like...feel my arteries clogging?
